Package org.sensorhub.impl.comm

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BluetoothConfig
    Driver configuration options for the Bluetooth hardware interface
    HTTPConfig
    Generic configuration class for HTTP connections
    IPConfig
    Driver configuration options for IP network protocols
    IPNetworkUtils
    Static helper methods for network operations
    NetworkManagerImpl
    Network manager allowing to list and configure all communication networks available on the platform.
    RobustHTTPConnection
    Helper class for handling automatic reconnections to HTTP services
    RobustIPConnection
    Helper class for handling automatic reconnections to hosts on IP networks
